channel.title: Interface Help!
channel.description:
Hey guys im working on a blank delta and I was wondering if anyone could help me add a pop up menu as a new player logs in. If you guys don't understand what im saying here is a example picture: [img]http://i57.tinypic.com/v4qmfp.png[/img]
If anyone knows how to do this could you please comment or PM me, Also if you know a tutorial page where I could go please put it in the comment below. Thanks!
